name: places/ChIJZfPph7pZwokR4j70DmjjyPY
adrFormatAddress: 315 8th Ave, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text:
Charles is the best speech coach I’ve worked with! He customizes the curriculum according to your goal and needs. Charles is a very patient teacher. Learning/ perfecting a new accent can be a very frustrating process but Charles made it easier and so much more fun!

Every time when I make new friends, they are always surprised that I have only been in America for 3 years! From my experience - if you’re willing to put in the hard work, Charles can definitely help you achieve your goal.

originalText.text:
As a professional actress and singer, I’ve been wanting to improve my standard American accent in order to be more versatile and play a wider range of roles. Luckily, I met Charles  when I moved to NYC from Turkey seven months ago and I’ve been working exclusively with him since then. Our lessons have been intense and yet so much fun at the same time. I personally love hard work and Charles never misses a single thing when we work on my scripts together. His insights into pronunciation and accents and his unique teaching methods have been a great guide for me. My professional actor friends immediately heard the change in my speech within the first couple of months.
Because of his patience, disciplined and organized approach, sense of humor, persistence in motivating me, and most importantly, his kind and humble personality; I feel very fortunate to have Charles Becker as my coach. I want to add one more thing… He’s also a great musician! His musical ear and skills have enhanced our lessons and accelerated my progress in mastering the American accent!

originalText.text:
If you’re reading this - work with Charles Becker! I spent one hour per week with Charles for one year, and it’s one of the best decisions I’ve made.

It’s hard to find this type of opportunity. From the moment you meet him, you’ll know Charles is an experienced professional. But he will treat you like a family member. He cares about his students. I found him patient when I needed patience and firm when I needed a breakthrough.

I’m Irish, a native English speaker. But as a news anchor, I have to speak with a standard American accent. Because my speech imperfections were so subtle, other voice coaches found it hard to refine my accent to a high standard.

This frustrated me because I couldn’t see the progress I wanted. With Charles, I saw results right away. He corrected vowels I didn’t even know were a problem. We also worked on intonation and rhythm - things I didn’t realize were so important.

We covered a lot of ground, but Charles made it fun and rewarding. I was improving every week and always had new experiences to share with him at our next meeting. My colleagues were very impressed with the fast progress.

I think Charles’ background as a musician is what sets him apart from other coaches I’ve worked with. He understands the musicality of speech - something critical, but often overlooked.

Charles also makes his lessons accessible and very affordable. Calling him a “Saint” might be hyperbolic, but I often do feel blessed to have meet such a good coach at such a critical time in my professional career.

originalText.text:
Charles is the most patient, encouraging teacher I’ve ever had the pleasure of working with- not to mention very affordable!

He is an expert at teaching pronunciation and accents. I found his methods very effective with immediate results. He also makes learning super fun and exciting. He customizes exercises that cater to my specific needs.

My industry friends and colleagues have seen huge improvements within just a couple of months. He has been very generous with his time and never been strict with sessions that went over our allotted schedule. Charles is such a good person with a passionate heart. I am very grateful to have found an awesome accent teacher/coach like him. Thanks Charles!

originalText.text:
Charles'  lessons are highly effective and fun!
I work as a live interpreter and translator so speaking English accurately with a standard American accent is of great importance to me.
Charles is a highly experienced teacher who can identify your specific pronunciation problems and provide you with clear solutions that you can grasp and apply with confidence in real life.  He makes you feel comfortable during the lesson because he catches your mistakes but corrects you calmly and respectfully.
If you truly desire to improve  your accent and English pronunciation, I strongly recommend that you go ahead and contact Charles Becker!
